Text.val: 27.05.2010 GB SCR15541 Replaced table CLTC by table LTCL
@ Part of previous ODC215, which perfoms database updates, see SCR 5825
... debtor client exists with client limit
Perform next step only if a debtor client was selected but where
-- Check if credit limit is at another debtor client
... credit limit exists at another debtor client
If the detected debtor is owner, no need to fetch legal owner again to get
